modName: TNF Modified Player Homes Bath Area Undressing
summary: This adds the scripts and triggers to the bathing areas for undressing and dressing on all of the TNF series of modified vanilla player homes.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]I'm a big fan of the TNF series of modified vanilla game player homes.  I like how they keep the vanilla feel, while providing equalization in feature sets like smithing, forging, enchanting, etc.  One of the features all the homes have is a bathing area, but there were no scripts for the use of them, so NPCs would use them fully clothed or armored.  I added the scripting and triggers to every home.  The mod is lightweight - it only includes the new scripts and modified esp files that include the new spells and triggers.  [u]You will need the original mod or mods installed FIRST, links below[/u]:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31222/?]BreezehomeTNF[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44807/?]HjerimTNF[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33888/?]HoneysideTNF[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40478/?]ProudspireTNF[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35278/?]VlindrelTNF[/url]
and for a further enhanced Breezehome, these are variants of goatk's original mod that I made edits to:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49347/?]Breezehome TNF - Elianora's Flavour by [b]goatk and Elianora[/b][/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65383/?]Breezehome TNF Expanded by Woodtortiose[/url]
(the Woodtortiose version includes a "working" toilet!) 

Use and Installation:

[list]
[*][size=3]I have provided these as separate mod downloads, by home, as people may or may not use all of the TNF housing mods. It's just easier that way.[/size]
[*][size=3]These mods will undress any npc that uses the bath area in the mods listed above.  I flagged the mod as adult/nudity, although that will depend on what you have installed in the way of body modification.  Whether or not you actually see nudity is on you, not me. I set the flag to satisfy the prudes out there, because someone was going to do it anyway.[/size]
[*][size=3]I consider this to be lore friendly. In real life, people don't bath in their clothes unless they have...issues.[/size]
[*][size=3]I highly recommend NMM for installation/uninstallation. You must say yes to the esp overwrite![/size]
[/list]
Credits:

goatk for his great TNF series of home upgrades
Elianora for her enhanced version of the TNF Breezehome
Woodtortiose for the TNF Expanded version
subtanker for his tutorial on scripting, as posted by Ac3s in the Nexus forums [url=http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/1081510-tutorial-by-subtanker-on-how-to-make-npcs-go-skinny-dipping/]here[/url]

My other mods:

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/66915/?]Beautiful Bandits[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65984/?]Fire and Ice[/url]



















[/size]
author: psychoslaphead
